## RouteContext type

Route context - route-specific data (children, params)

Passed as the second argument to connected components. Kept separate from the service to maintain explicit ownership.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type RouteContext<TConfig extends AdapterConfig> = {
    children: RefSpec<TConfig['baseElement']>[] | null;
    params: Readable<RouteParams>;
};
```
**References:** [AdapterConfig](../../view/adapterconfig/)<!-- -->, [RefSpec](../../view/refspec/)<!-- -->, [Readable](../../signals/readable/)<!-- -->, [RouteParams](../routeparams/)
